attributes.additional_details:
We, the below-named citizens and voters of Great Britain, petition that Ismeli Baleiwai should be granted immediate British Citizenship and we further ask that the Border Agency be ordered to deal with this matter urgently to avoid the possible separation of Ismeli Baleiwai from his British family.

We  believe that all men and women of Commonwealth or Foreign Nationality who have served our country in our armed forces and who have been prepared to lay  down their lives for us in any active campaign, must have an automatic right to be accepted as British Citizens.
